DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics investigational basal insulin patch type 1 diabetes patient .
DOC.brief_title: Transdermal Basal Insulin Patch Study Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The study look patient meet follow criterion : - Duration type diabetes great equal 10 year - HbA1C le equal 9.0 % - C-peptide negative - Ages 18 - 65 , male female - Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.5 - 32 - Non-smoker - No advanced diabetes complication - Not pregnant breast feeding
DOC.criteria: Duration type 1 diabetes great equal 10 year HbA1c less equal 9.0 % Cpeptide negative Ages 18 65 , male female BMI 18.5 32 Non smoker No advance diabetes complication Not pregnant breast feeding Arm leg rash , open wound , skin condition Psychiatric disorder Participation clinical research trial last 3 month Clinically significant acute illness
